Did Shirdi Sai Trust Donate ₹35 Crore To Haj Committee? No, Viral Claim Is False

Claim:
An image of a Google search showing a tweet, dated April 20, 2023, which states that Shirdi Sai Trust has donated ₹35 Crore to the Haj committee has gone viral. Newschecker received the image on their WhatsApp tipline multiple times requesting to be fact checked.

Fact:
A keyword search for "Shirdi Sai Trust," "Haj" and "35 crore" on Google did not yield any credible reports on such a donation by the Shirdi Sai Trust.

However, a report by ETV Bharat Marathi, dated April 24, 2023, dismissed the claims that the trust donated crores to the Haj committee. Rahul Jadhav, CEO of Sai Sansthan, clarified that the constitution of the Sai institute does not have a provision for any such funds. He added that no one asked them for any donations, so there is no point about giving or denying funds to anyone.

Newschecker further reached out to the PRO of the Shirdi Sai Trust who further refuted the claim. He told them that no funds have been donated to the Haj Committee.

Result: False

Sources:
- Report by ETV Bharat, Dated April 24, 2023
- Conversation with RPO of Shirdi Sai Temple Trust
